name: Spikes And Doors For The Android Platform
blurb: Spikes And Doors for the Android device market. We are moving our exciting new multiplayer software board game to Android.

rewards.reward: A sincere \u201cThank You!\u201d from us, we appreciate it. Every dollar counts. Your name will be listed as a backer on our website.
A free download copy of the Windows PC version of Spikes And Doors.  Your name will be listed as a backer on our website.
